question: The Union Cabinet has approved a MoU with which country on scientific and technical cooperation?
explanation:
The Union Cabinet has recently approved a memorandum of understanding (MoU) on scientific and technical cooperation between India and UAE
India’s Ministry of Earth Sciences and UAE’s National Centre of Meteorology will collaborate to share knowledge and oceanic services, deploy meteorological observation networks. The countries also aim to support the Tsunami Early Warning Centre (TEWC).
